sentence.Network_en: Low sales for turbot during the past months have led to a price drop.
sentence.Network_cn: 大菱前几个月交易量偏低,导致价格下降.

sentence.Network_en: Moreover, substitute products are still showing lower prices when compared with turbot.
sentence.Network_cn: 而且, 一些可替代产品在与大菱的竞争中又降低了价格.

sentence.Network_en: The adenosine triphosphatease ( ATPase ) gene of turbot reddish body iridovirus ( TRBIV ) was cloned and sequenced.
sentence.Network_cn: 克隆了大菱鲆红体病虹彩病毒 ( TRBIV ) 的重要功能蛋白———腺苷三磷酸酶(adenosinetriphosphatease,ATPase ) 基因的全部编码区及其上下游部分的核苷酸序列.

derivation.yuyuan_name: Middle English: from Old French, of Scandinavian origin

entry.tran: 大菱鲆，大比目鱼（产于欧洲海域）
entry.def: Turbot are a type of edible flat fish that live in European seas.

means.word_mean: 1. flesh of a large European flatfish
